data.title: Good Local Restaurant
data.text: Baker's Rack is a good local restaurant in downtown Jackson.  They have home cooking and good desserts.  The people that work there are always friendly.  Try their chicken salad !

data.title: Great Lunch Menu
data.text: Lunch menu is great. Very fast service.  You can get in and out in an hour.  Friendly staff.  Baked goods are truly home-made goodness.

data.title: Good food.
data.text: Good food and great bakery items.  Menu could use a bit of variety.  But items offered are excellent.  Service is good.

data.title: good food and great desserts!
data.text: If I am downtown on business, I will occasionally stop by the Baker's Rack for lunch and dessert. The wait staff have always been friendly, the food is fresh, and the desserts are REALLY GOOD!

data.title: Take home desserts
data.text: This locally owned restaurant offers a good choice for lunch downtown on a budget. They have items from egg salad sandwiches to a hot plate. Really good desserts are available . A whole casserole and pies and cakes can be taken home after lunch.

data.title: Great service and food
data.text: Very nice and clean, great food, they made us breakfast to order, easy in and out.  Not overly crowded and comfortable

data.title: Dessert Heaven
data.text: We have been here several times and have found the food always to be excellent. All their quiche are great - cheesy and delicious. Strawberry salad is to die for. But this place really rocks desserts - my favorite is the Chess Squares. They are ooey gooey good!!! I have NEVER gotten a bad dessert, though, and I've tried a lot they have to offer.

data.title: Good lunch
data.text: Ate here with friends. My first time but they eat here regularly. I liked it. We all had the special of chicken enchiladas and salad. They were very good. Will definitely be back.

data.title: Great place for lunch ; )
data.text: Stopped in for lunch one afternoon and found the food and service to both be pretty good.  Great place to eat.

data.title: Old time charm and good food at a reasonable price
data.text: The food was very flavorful the portions were adequate until someone ordered chili. A bowl of chili was enough for any two people. when I come to downtown Jackson I will eat here again.

data.title: Great little southern breakfast or lunch
data.text: Tired of eating at a chain. Want something that is cooked with love and down home good? Well, my I suggest this locally owned downtown treasure. It's a little off the highway, but easy enough to get back on. We heard some great things about this little restaurant/ bakery, and decided to try it. This is a local downtown favorite that is worth a little extra time to find. Parking downtown is easy and ample. The breakfast crowd was easy to deal with. Only open during week days. We were passing by Jackson and gave it two visits so far and will return! We were greeted at the door and asked to seat ourselves. We found a nice big booth and sat down. The walls are covered with local art work. There is a bakery counter across the room. The air was filled with wonderful aromas and folks talking over a nice breakfast or pastry. We had the same waitress each time and she is very efficient, sweet, and offered suggestions. We had great coffee and water to drink. I had the country ham with two eggs and biscuits and gravy. You can get grits, too as a side. The coffee was hot and good. The meal was prepared with love and was filling. The table had several jelly packets to choose different flavors. My  wife enjoyed her one egg, biscuits, gravy, and bacon. Afterwards we got in the car and headed toward Nashville. Y'all really should really give this place a try. It was really worth the trip!

data.title: Great place for lunch and sweet treats!
data.text: The Bakers Rack is a gem in downtown Jackson......great food, atmosphere and people.  The plate lunches are great....and the desserts are AMAZING!  We absolutely love it there!

data.title: August
data.text: Ooh yummy had the spicy catfish filet and what a treat..they have homemade desserts daily and quite the lunch crowd I believe breakfast as well...nice locale downtown plenty of parking good southern food

data.title: Best restaurant in downtown Jackson.
data.text: A great place for breakfast and lunch.  The food is always good and reasonably priced.  My favorite downtown restaurant

data.title: Locally owned
data.text: Baker's Rack is a downtown locally owned restaurant that serves down home southern food. The food is delicious and the service great. Great breakfasts and lunches. And I would highly recommend the strawberry cake and heath bar cake...actually all their desserts are fabulous.

data.title: Average at best.
data.text: Only average food.  It is a popular place to eat in downtown Jackson due to the lack of competition in the downtown area.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Excellent! Great place to meet friends and enjoy the hometown atmosphere.  I would recommend this to everyone!

data.title: Great local favorite.
data.text: Friendly staff, great food and a great local favorite.  "Life is too short, not to have dessert" and they have the best.

data.title: Cute little place
data.text: They have a yummy strawberry salad here. I love the pancake events that they do to donate to wrap, etc.

data.title: Downtown Jackson Treasure
data.text: What a TREASURE!  It is located in the old Holland's building (for you old Jacksonians!).  Nothing fancy, just great home cooking served by sweet servers.  The desserts are homemade and fabulous!  There are freezer boxes with entrees and desserts, too, for you to serve at home.
